Literature.Title: Structural and functional characterization of NDBP-4 family antimicrobial peptides from the scorpion Mesomexovis variegatus.
Literature.Author: Jiménez-Vargas JM, Ramírez-Carreto S, Corzo G, Possani LD, Becerril B, Ortiz E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>300µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>300µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>300µM),Candida albicans(MIC=>200µM),Candida glabrata(MIC=>200µM)
